attributes.action: Recognise Juan Guaidó as the legitimate President of Venezuela.
attributes.additional_details: We must follow lawful nations in South America and our allies in Canada and the United States in helping the Venezuelan people and removing this vile dictator.
attributes.background: After an election that is seen as fraudulent by many in the international community, Nicolas Maduro has seized power via deceit. He has caused widespread poverty and oppressed the people. Due to this, we must recognise President Guaidó as the legitimate President until free elections can be held.
